Producer: Pam Marsden, Paul Marshal, Steve Oedekerk
Production Co: Paramount Pictures, O Entertainment, Nickelodeon Movies
Synopsis: Like the other animals in the barn, Otis the bull (Kevin James) likes to sing and play while the farmer is away. However, the carefree bovine must soon find the courage to be a leader when, unexpectedly, he finds himself in a position of great responsibility.
Title: Barnyard: The Original Party Animals
